reviews.text: Service was quick and hospitable. Will definitely  come again. Margaret was a great waitress
Margaret was the best server ever! We had several people come to our table and every member of the staff was absolutely amazing. Delicious drinks, amazing service, and great happy hour deals!
Margaret is amazing she was the best at recommending drinks on happy hour AND they do strong cocktails which is rare in NYC. 10/10 I promise

I came back and I just need to say how enamored I am with the vibe of this place. The excellent drinks are buoyed by an excellent wait staff who embody hospitality in the best way. Can‚Äôt remember her name off the top of my head but the redhead behind the bar might be one of the most underrated mixologists in the city!
the food was so good and the service was so good. would come back!
Colby was the man! Perf service!
Great food and service! Colby was a great server and attentive.

Been here for st paddy‚Äôs day and for post marathon brunch and am always impressed by how accommodating the staff is here. The names for cocktails cracks me up, happy hour deal is great, and the sauces r high key amazing (what‚Äôs in the ketchup?).
Shoutout Colby <3
I came here with three friends and we had a great time! We didn‚Äôt have reservations but we got in right away. The servers are super friendly and the cocktails are delicious
Great service and vibes!
So glad we came here! Drinks and music were so good, and our server Kira was so fun!
Kira was great. Very attentive and friendly. Food, delicious. Drinks, creative. Music, bangin'.
Amazing energy!! Thank you Kira for complementing my sweater
If you're in the mood for a trend driven but very tasty cocktail this is the place for you. Our waitress Kira was so nice.
Amazing bar. Kira was such a great waitress. Cannot recommend more.
Great space with 2 bars. Good happy hour. Just talk to Eddie. Love their house lager.
Service is amazing. Everyone that works here is so so kind. Pasta Monday is amazing, food and cocktails are all so delicious
We came for happy hour and had a great time! Drinks were wonderful and our waitress, Katelyn, was fantastic! Will definitely bring friend her in the future
Amazing! Very cute halloween decorations and great vibe! Our waitress Katelyn was amazing!! Would definitely recommend!
Best Aperol Spritz in the upper east side !
GREAT LOCAL SPOT, friendly service!!!

Shout out to Margaret for being an excellent and attentive server‚Äîand just all-around awesome. The whole team was quite accommodating of our reservation and took great care of us. The food was delicious without being fussy, and the drinks were nice and strong. Honestly, what more could you ask for?

Had the absolute best time here. Margaret was one of the best servers I‚Äôve had since moving to NYC, she‚Äôs a true gem. Shawn was awesome and made our night. The drinks are fun and themed (we got Taylor swift drinks), and the music is great too. The food was also excellent. Can‚Äôt say enough good things.
Had a great time. Really fun drinks
Lively place. Food was a little hit and miss but service was very slow as they were busy with diners (and it appears from take outs).

If I could give this place more than 5 stars, I would. We love Sojourn and recently hosted our wedding reception here. Shawn , Colby and their entire team were so accommodating and everybody who attended raved about the food and drinks. It‚Äôs such a warm, and fun environment. Food is great, drinks are phenomenal. They have so many happy hour deals through the week too. It‚Äôs a true neighborhood gem!

First time coming here. We started the dinner with Tequila Negroni and a That Me Espresso Martini. Both drinks were delicious and pretty strong!

We also ordered long Island Duck Croquettes. It was nice and crispy, but I wasn‚Äôt sure what it was really. The sauce was nice and had a punch from the mustard.

We also got a Chef‚Äôs Special Burger cook medium well and a 30 days dried aged ribeye steak cooked medium rare. The bacon in the burger was cooked to perfection. It was nice and crispy, and not greasy at all. The ribeye was also tender and flavorful. Everything was very nice.

The servers were nice and friendly. However, the music was quite loud and it was very hard to talk. Everyone was basically yelling in order to have a conversation. Overall, it was a very nice restaurant.
Such a great nice awesome server, happy hour deal is awesome
I had such an amazing experience here! The fall menu had just started and the salmon was cooked beautifully! Kira, a server there was amazing and super helpful! 10/10
espresso martini was the best i've ever had!!!
great happy hour deals. We loved the back patio
My favorite UES watering hole. Me gusta.
Obsessed with the space and the staff! Come here no doubt.
Best place for birthdays! Love all the bartenders & then martoooons are üî•
Love this local spot. Awesome bartenders, great drinks and a fun menu

I never give reviews but this honestly deeply saddened me. A restaurant that charges $20+ for its entrees should not be serving their soda out of a plastic 2L bottle. It was a hot day and I was looking for a crisp Diet Coke to quench my thirst. When I saw the bartender pull out the 2L plastic bottle my stomach dropped. This Diet Coke was not crisp in any way. It was completely flat and despite being over ice, tasted warm. If you don‚Äôt have a soda fountain at your restaurant that‚Äôs fine‚Ä¶BUT BUY CANS OR INDIVIDUAL GLASS BOTTLES!
We stayed at the bar for drinks and both the bartenders were great!! The drinks were awesome) bloody Mary, bloody Maria, pink pony club, peach betta have my money); try this place!!
Emily was such an attentive and sweet server! Definitely recommend coming here, especially during happy hour! The staff are amazing :)
Good food! Emily was a great waiter very helpful!
Such an amazing experience! The outside atmosphere was perfect, and the staff was nothing less than wonderful!!
Such a cute spot! Great place for happy hour and really fun drinks! Highly recommend
Great happy hour deal

I was there for a watch party and everyone was lovely. Great crowd, great staff, good food. They really tried to make the watch party fun an engaging with themed drinks and stuff.  10/10 would go again
Great outdoor vibes for a hot day!
I‚Äôve been coming here for a while and it‚Äôs always an amazing experience. It never disappoints. Colby, and Emily are my favorite! They treat me and my guests always like family üíï
good time always. Food is great drinks are a great price. Colby is awesome üíïüíïüíï
Went here with my girls<3 had the best timeüñ§The staff is amazing very respectful and accommodating
Margret and Colby are the ABSOLUTE best! They are were so nice and had great service! Will definitely be back (truffle fries slayed)!
This place is amazing!!! The vibes are immaculate and the service is amazing (esp. Shawn) they have great deals and it‚Äôs definitely worth coming

From start to finish, my experience at Sojuun Social was outstanding. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, perfect for both a casual dinner or a special occasion. Our server, Draytin was friendly, attentive, and made thoughtful recommendations that didn‚Äôt disappoint.

I‚Äôve been to this place multiple times for drinks and food, and every visit has been fantastic! I absolutely love that it‚Äôs dog-friendly‚Äîthey even have a fun and well-organized puppy happy hour that adds such a unique touch. The decor is stylish and welcoming, and the patio is a perfect spot to relax, especially with a furry friend.

I recently attended a dog-themed event here and was seriously impressed with how smoothly everything was run. Not only is it a great spot for drinks, but the food was surprisingly good too. Our meals came out quickly, fresh, and exactly as ordered. Everyone in my group was happy with their dishes, and the couple next to us even complimented the staff on how efficient and friendly they were.

I ordered a mimosa, which was perfectly mixed and super refreshing. The service throughout our visit was warm and attentive‚Äîeven during the busy rush, the staff made sure we were taken care of with smiles and genuine hospitality. It's clear they care about the customer experience, and it really shows. As someone who‚Äôs worked in the restaurant industry, I appreciate the level of professionalism and heart this place offers. Can‚Äôt wait to come back again!

Love the outdoor seating! First time at sojourn social and had a great dining experience. The staff was very helpful and friendly. My burger was made to perfection. My aunt stake was delicious. Our dog Rosie can confirm it all!!!

Ambiance (5/5): This restaurant is absolutely beautiful interior and exterior. I love eating here because it feels fancy, welcoming, and cozy all at the same time! I especially like how dog friendly this place is. This is why I brought my dog to dine in their outside patio. There's a front patio with several dining spots and the outdoor patio has covered dining in little mini private booths and tables about the backyard, multi-level spaces. There's string lights, fake greenery. It feels like you're someplace not in the middle of the city. I love love loved this spot.
Service (5/5): They brought a Bark-cuterie for my dog and provided constant refills for her too! We were helped throughout the dining experience and waitress was super sweet when I asked her what the cola spritz was. When asked what the M&M shot was, she also kindly got me one even though I didn't order from the menu when my friend did! It was super sweet!
Food (5/5): We came for their Thursday specials $10 aerprols: THERSy day for a girl dinner of coke aerprol, Caesar salad, and M&M shot. I decided to go for their summer special of a salmon on a bed of quinoa 'risotto' corn. The presentation was beautiful! The salmon had a nice sear and was cooked to a medium-rare which made the fish very tender.
Can't wait to come back again!

love the environment/atmosphere. the service is amazing as well. great variety between individual entrees (pasta, steak) and shareable items (charcuterie board). the drink names are so creative and the drinks themselves are phenomenal, which makes for a perfect combination. good place for a catch-up or a more casual lunch/dinner that still has a real sit-down vibe to it.

Sojourn Social just won ‚ÄúBest Brunch Ever‚Äù in my dog‚Äôs eyes ‚Äî and mine too! Such a hidden gem. Their dog mom brunch event was pawsitively perfect. Good vibes, great bites, and the cocktails were so creative and perfectly executed they were so yummy and delicious I can‚Äôt wait to go back, the pups were lounging and when we arrived at our table we found a spot and tango treat sample bag, a little soap gift set for the moms and raffle tickets it was soo cute and thoughtful. The menu made both humans and fur babies feel spoiled. The Caesar Salad was crisp and punchy, the Duck Rillette Croquettes were rich little bites of heaven, and the Arugula & Radicchio salad brought the perfect bitter crunch. I couldn‚Äôt resist the Coque Madame (hello, cheesy perfection) while my fianc√©e swore the Eggs Benedict was the best he‚Äôs had in ages. The pups enjoyed the carrots and prosciutto. The staff was so sweet (to us and the dogs) they make you feel like regular even if it‚Äôs your first time there like us. We sat outdoors and the atmosphere strikes the perfect balance between cozy and vibrant it was so laid-back but full of energy it was full of happy pups with tail wags all around. My pups made new friends, and we all left with full bellies and happy hearts. 10/10, would wag and brunch again already counting down to the next one!

My new favorite place to go with my puppy. We had such a great time!

They accommodated us very quickly and brought my pup a bowl of carrots and prosciutto (that he inhaledüòÜ) and water right away.
The menu was great and our espresso martinis were absolutely delicious and sooo pretty!!!
Oysters and tuna tartare were yummy!

Definitely going back for the great service and atmosphere ‚ÄºÔ∏è
Absolutely beautiful place with great people. The food is amazing and the setting is very well taken care of. I go every week and highly recommend it to both groups of friends and couples.

One of the worst serving experiences I have ever encountered. The server didn‚Äôt smile once. He had an attitude when they brought my meal and it differed from what they stated it entailed on the menu. They have random secret rules where they don‚Äôt make things during lunch time but didn‚Äôt inform the customer or the server apparently. That being said, my duck was great. The fried rice they made was also really good. The drinks have adorable names that mimic songs and books. The happy hour deal is nice and the drinks are tasty. It‚Äôs worth visiting if you can avoid that server that tried to ruin my graduation day.

We had a great brunch experience here and look forward to returning soon. We were welcomed by their friendly and attentive staff, found the chicken meatballs absolutely delicious and walked out knowing we found our new favorite pet friendly spot in the city.

Nice warm bar in the UES to catch a Dawgs game in and get out of the cold. Good drinks -maybe less ice, more booze in the Sojourn Sour. I did not have food but it did look appetizing. Good service from the staff, even if I was a bit cranky from a nail-biter of a game. Thanks William and the gal with long black hair.
Neighborhood spot with amazing food and service. The tuna tartare and squid ink Tonnarelli are delicious. They also have a great happy hour and specials.
If you don‚Äôt mind the loud music it‚Äôs the perfect place to meet friends and have good food. The beets salad is so so delicious.

Just had a private party for 90 people at Sojourn Social.  Shawn, the manager, was wonderful to work with to create the plan.  His Team provided excellent service, great vibe, and a fantastic party experience!  My guests were raving about the food and just loved the venue!  The bartenders managed the crowd easily serving creative cocktails and wine.  Music and lighting were perfect.  I highly recommend Sojourn Social for lunch, dinner, or a private event.  Shawn and his Team are stars!

We had a great experience in this tasty restaurant. We had a conversation with the owner about the restaurant he is so generous. Great hospitality and cozy atmosphere. Highly recommend cheesecake and chefs special burger.

The food at Sojourn Social was absolutely incredible, with a great selection of both brunch and regular menu options. We started with the short rib sliders, and to our delight, they added an extra one to accommodate our entire table‚Äîsuch a thoughtful touch! The bottomless brunch was fantastic; they kept the drinks flowing and even brought over an extra bottle to ensure we were always topped up. The service was impeccable throughout the meal. Highly recommend for anyone looking for excellent food and outstanding service!
Colby is the best waiter! He was very attentive. The food was also amazing. My pup Blue also loved this place. They gave him ham pieces and carrots and he was in heaven!
This was an incredible experience with super friendly and helpful staff, delicious foods, and strong, generous drinks. Perfect for any occasion, I will be a new regular!

The drinks here are devilishly good. So much so, I forgot to take pictures of the food. üòÑ My bad.

Just one Naked in Manhattan had me feeling nice.
The second had me smiling.
The third had me contemplating if I should order another.
And the fourth had me on cloud nine. I've been thinking of this drink ever since. It has changed me.

The food was good. I enjoyed the steak option. I don't remember exactly what I ordered, but it was great. üòÉ

The service was top-notch and super-friendly. They gave us crayons, paper and legos. So awesome when you are "happy."

Its definitely worth doing the bottomless drinks if you can handle it.

But cation: Naked in Manhattan is not just the name of the drink, its a warning.

We had a lovely dining experience at Sojourn Social in New York City that‚Äôs worth sharing.
From the moment we arrived, the atmosphere felt relaxed yet vibrant,  the perfect spot for a warm summer afternoon. We opted to sit outside, and I‚Äôm so glad we did. The outdoor seating area is beautifully set up, offering a comfortable and lively space that really enhances the overall vibe.
One of the highlights of our meal was the Caesar salad. It was simple, crisp, and flavorful ‚Äî the kind of dish that reminds you why classics stay classic. Fresh romaine, just the right amount of dressing, and a generous dusting of parmesan made it really satisfying without being too heavy.
What truly stood out, though, was the service. Our waitress went above and beyond to accommodate us when we asked about a specific menu item that wasn‚Äôt technically available. She checked with the kitchen and made it happen without hesitation, which made us feel especially taken care of. It‚Äôs that kind of attention to detail that makes a place memorable.
Whether you‚Äôre looking for a casual lunch or a laid-back dinner with friends, Sojourn Social delivers on food, service, and setting. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back.

Cannot recommend this restaurant or Colby their server enough. We hosted a private dinner event this past week and it was flawless. If you are looking to host something here ‚Äî DO IT and request Colby! Thanks x a million for a successful private event!

Sojourn Social never disappoints. I love their creative cocktails, like their zodiac spritz series - Taurus Spritz shown here made with macha, honey, lemon and prosecco. Their menu is inventive yet reliably delicious. We‚Äôre lucky to have this neighborhood staple!

The food and service is excellent. The best shrimp taco I‚Äôve ever had. The skirt steak was delicious and the salmon was the best. The people are friendly and the drinks are food too. You will not be disappointed. The price is not high at all for such delicious food made by this chef.

This didn‚Äôt get 5 stars just because it‚Äôs my namesake, (trust me, I judged it a little harder for this exact reason) but OMG what a delight Sojourn Social is!

Super cute exterior & interior. Great for a date night, girls/guys night. Not too crowded, not too loud, but a perfect city restaurant right on 2nd Ave where the hustle & bustle awaits.

We went on a Friday in Sojvember at 6 leaving us one hour to enjoy happy hour. 2 for 1 drinks & those baby‚Äôs were strong. Delicious yes, but strong & that‚Äôs exactly how we like it! You can also get small plates for $7 but we were hungry & went straight to the menu!

We had the calamari to start which was fresh & tasted like it. The marinara sauce for dipping was also really good. (Note to Chef/Manager the Fra Diavolo sauce with the Squid Ink Tortellini would go crazy as a dipping sauce for the calamari or drizzle of coating on top. Thank me later.) I ordered the Skirt Steak & he ordered the Duck Breast. Honey baby love both were delicious. I‚Äôm not that well versed in duck but it had the sear of a steak with the flavor/texture that resembled chicken & while that my sound crazy, I promise you it was amazingggg & the fried rice that it came with?? I should‚Äôve ordered some on the side to go. That steak? Grilled perfectly, nailed the temperature on the cook, the chimmichurri was delectable & that ginger ketchup(could bottle & sell tbh) were the perfect accompaniment for those golden fries.

All in all? Yes. I‚Äôll absolutely be back for happy hour, brunch & to try other items on their menu. So happy to have a place that‚Äôs my own ü•∞
Love this place, such a good local spot. 2 for 1 cocktails happy hour!! Unspeakable deal in nyc and their cocktails are so fun :)

Love this place!!! The got the best deals every day on food and drinks (not just happy hour, but pasta mondays, girl dinner Thursdays etc). They even do themed nights - went there for the MET Gala viewing (look at the special menu, so cute)

Upon arrival I thought to myself ‚Äúlet‚Äôs go somewhere else‚Ä¶‚Äù. Ha, we would‚Äôve missed out on a great night out and excellent dining experience.

This place is really good. The ambiance, the food and the SERVICE. Exceptional service is still alive in the city. From the moment we walked in we knew it was the right choice to not change up the plan. Shoutout goes to Emily!

We had a ceasar salad, candied pecan arugula salad, skirt steak chimichurri, island faroe salmon, dark chocolate brownie, ricotta cheesecake and a couple of drinks, all while watching the games that were on that night. Just an overall great experience. Highly recommend.
Lovely place, great vibes, amazing food and service; the atmosphere is second to none. One of the best happy hours in the city!
Me and the girls GO TO for getting drinks, food and chit chatting away! The staff is so welcoming, extremely generous, and always a great time! Couldn't recommend or rave about them more!

Unbelievable experience.  Food was phenomenal service was exceptional and the Private room experience  was storybook.. I entertained one of my most valuable clients in the private room and from start to finish they catered to all of my needs and then some. We had so much fun it brought me back to my 20's as we stayed for over 4 hours. Looking forward to our excursion!!!

I absolutely love Sojourn Social. It‚Äôs a great neighborhood spot. The food is great, the drinks are delicious and strong, and best of all, they allow dogs! My dog absolutely loves it there (they give dogs barkcuterie). The manager and bartender are also a lot of fun and they have great daily specials.

With so many options to dine in the city it‚Äôs hard to keep coming back to places that are a little forgettable. Food was fine. The service is fine and atmosphere is fine. Got the salmon and the duck which are both OK. I did enjoy the happy hour drinks deal - may come back for that next time.

Literally the best place ever. Sojourn Social is more than just a restaurant ‚Äî it‚Äôs an experience. They treat you like family from the moment you walk in, always going above and beyond to make every visit special. The food is absolutely incredible and the drinks are just as tasty and fun. It‚Äôs my happy place in the UES and the first place I take anyone who visits NYC. I literally have people who request it now when they come back into town - cannot say enough good things!!!

First drinks are amazing!  Came here for happy hour and 2 for 1.... Drinks are about $16 for 1 not bad in this economy, but 2 for 1.... yep!  I had a French 75  or at this establishment a  Lorazapam Lemonade.  Usually it is served in a champange glass.  Not  here.. a full wine glass.  The drinks are strong and good.    Now the food.. I only had the wings.. good but tough, same as most establishments.  Overall I would say this is a place to be!
12/10 would recommend. Amazing food. Happy Hour specials are insane! And the overall  vibe is imaculate

Drinks took over 20 minutes to be served,  food took an additional 30 minutes, after a detour to someone else's table. After inquiring about our burgers,  which we could clearly see, our server told us to be lucky we got our drinks since everyone was waiting. "It'll be a long time!" When they discovered our food on a neighboring table,  in full view of our table,  they said nothing about the mixup. I'm pretty sure we were served those same burgers. Never got the 2nd order of drinks we ordered. We had to chase the server for basics like ketchup and utensils. I hope this was an off night,  but I'll never know. I won't be back. Not even for the pineapple rum old fashioned,  which was super tasty!

Me and my friends love coming to Sojourn! Definitely a UES staple with my all time favorite happy hours, who doesn't love a 2 for 1 spritz. The entire staff has always been so friendly and welcoming. I went for the love Island watch party and had an amazing experience. from the themed menu to the awesome personalized signs. Sojourn will continue to be a spot my friends and I come to regularly!

Have been to this place twice and love it! Called last minute for a reservation of 8 last night and they were very accommodating. The drinks were amazing and the food was incredible. Our server was very welcoming and friendly. My family loved this place, definitely plan to go back!!

Great for happy hour buy one get one lots of choices and you can mix and match with small plates as well. Yesterday Reps from Wild Turkey Bourbon giving out samples/products it was really good.  The name came from 2 friends hunting for turkeys and combining 2 samples of bourbon together hence the name Wild Turkey Bourbon stuck.
Absolutely delighted gnocchi, squash salad and brownie. Very nice experience coming to sojourn social. Good selection of wines and kind service ‚ù§Ô∏è
